site.name: WAYD Groupe
site.tagline: Bringing Moroccan Harvests To The World
site.description: We bring Moroccan tomatoes to the world. High quality, fresh and grown with care for both land and farmers.

hero.title: Bringing Moroccan
hero.description: We bring Moroccan tomatoes to the world. High quality, fresh and grown with care for both land and farmers.

yearsExperience.label: Years of Experience
yearsExperience.description: More than 50 years in Moroccan agriculture have allowed us to develop unparalleled expertise in cultivating premium, fresh vegetables that meet the highest standards.

farmsInProgress.label: Farms in Progress
farmsInProgress.description: Over 100 certified farms in Moroccan agriculture have been allowed us to develop unmatched expertise in cultivating premium, fresh tomatoes that meet the highest standards.

localFarmers.label: Local Farmers Supported
localFarmers.description: More than 500 farmers in Moroccan agriculture have been allowed us to develop unparalleled expertise in cultivating premium, fresh tomatoes that meet the highest standards.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Empowering Moroccan Agriculture
mission.description: We are committed to supporting local farmers and bringing the finest Moroccan produce to global markets while maintaining sustainable practices.

goal.title: Our goal is to share Morocco's finest tomatoes with the worldâ€”fresh, high-quality, and grown with care for both land and farmers.
goal.description: We believe that true growth comes from more than just harvests. By investing in modern farming techniques, empowering local communities, and maintaining strict quality controls, we ensure that every tomato exported from Morocco carries not only freshness and flavor but also the values of trust, sustainability, and excellence.

who.title: We are a leading Moroccan agricultural company dedicated to bringing premium organic vegetables to global markets.
who.description: With decades of experience in cultivation and export, we've built strong partnerships with local farmers and international buyers. Our team combines traditional farming wisdom with modern agricultural technology to ensure the highest quality standards in every harvest.

vision.title: To become the world's most trusted source of premium Moroccan organic vegetables, setting new standards for quality and sustainability.
vision.description: We envision a future where Moroccan agriculture is recognized globally for its excellence, innovation, and commitment to environmental stewardship. Through continuous improvement and strategic partnerships, we aim to expand our reach while maintaining our core values of quality, sustainability, and community support.

mission.title: To deliver exceptional organic vegetables while empowering Moroccan farmers and protecting our agricultural heritage.
mission.description: Our mission is to bridge the gap between Morocco's rich agricultural tradition and global market demands. We invest in cutting-edge farming technology, provide fair pricing to local farmers, and implement sustainable practices that preserve our land for future generations. Every tomato we export represents our commitment to excellence and community development.

precisionAgriculture.description: Using smart technology to monitor and control every stage of tomato cultivation: planting, watering, and harvesting for optimal results.

cropMonitoring.title: Crop Monitoring
